medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 months prior to presentation in June 2014. The patient experienced neck pain without neurological findings. Intensity and progression details are not specified.
medical_history.social_history: Patient lives in rural northwestern New Mexico and frequently visits Navajo Lake near her home. Family's two dogs underwent eye examination and skin snips without evidence of onchocerca infection. No known travel outside the USA or contact with other animals or insect-bite exposures.
